txt.en: 'So do the weak die to make room for the strong... but you do not belong here. Now go....'
'The goblins came and took her... down into their caves. There she will remain until they torment her to death.'
Defeat Blackfang
The challenge has been issued
Defeated Blackfang
Thorgest told you that you may be able to learn of Glorwen's fate by confronting their pack-leader, Blackfang.
'Who dares? You are not of the pack, and yet you would challenge me? So be it....'

'I know this is asking much of you, but if Thorgest believes that the only way we might learn something from the Wargs of Starkhath is to challenge their leader, then I can see no other way forwards.\n\n'Glorwen's life may hang in the balance -- if she yet lives at all. For her sake as well as yours, take care and arm yourself well.'
The totem of challenge is in the centre of the ruins of Starkhath.\n\nNogmeldir has asked you to find the totem and call out the Warg-leader Blackfang.

'Your tidings chill me to the bone, [placeholder]. Few are those who have escaped from the dark, twisted caves of Goblin-town once they have ventured within.

'The hatred of the goblins for my kin is great, and Glorwen's torments will be long and cruel at their hands.

'We must prepare -- by stealth or force of arms -- to rescue her, for even should we lose a dozen heroes to the darts and blades of the goblins, still our suffering will be as nothing compared to hers should we leave her to their devices!'
Return to Nogmeldir at Vindurhal and tell him of Glorwen's capture by the goblins of Goblin-town.
'Seek the Wargs' Totem of Challenge, [placeholder]... you may learn something of Glorwen's fate.'
'Grr-iiipe! Enough! I... I yield....'
'Who dares? You are not of the pack, and yet you would challenge me? So be it....'
'You want the Elf? She means nothing to us.'
Find the totem of challenge and defeat Blackfang
'Now go! I shall not cede the pack to one such as you... challenge or no.'
Defeated Blackfang
'What is the meaning of this? Stop!'
Blackfang
'No! I lead you! Grraahh!'
